title: brOvanu rArA
sahitya:
brOvanu rArA shrI bhU manOharA birAna nannu


anupallavi

  bhAvaja janaka nE niraparAdhi murAri nannu


caraNam 1    sArahInamagu samsAramuna dakalaka manasAra ninu pUjincina sArasAkSa sAmi nanu
    caraNam 2    vAsavArcita nArada vyAsa suka hrdkamala nivAsa nagadhara shrInivAsa dEva dEva nannu
    caraNam 3    phala lOcananuta surapAla vara yadukula bhUpAla paripAlita gOpAladAsa dAnavAri
